name: Arena Car Stunt Wars
description:
Arena Car Stunt Wars bring you a deadly derby car battle where smashing cars firing missiles will knock out your derby opponents. It’s time to win extreme derby stunts war in derby demolition car battle and experience furious driving and crash racing. Experience extreme derby car stunts in fast death racing game where you will crash derby rivals.
Features:
• Crash & smash the cars inside arena!
• Battle against multiple opponents!
• Survive the deadly demolition derby war!
• Destruction, fire, hurdles, jumps, crash & car stunts!
• Extreme car stunts driving and crash racing!
• Realistic car physics and smooth controls!
